def_en: If you revise the way you think about something, you adjust your thoughts, usually in order to make them better or more suited to how things are.

def_cn: 调整，改变(价格、数目、估计等)
def_en: If you revise a price, amount, or estimate, you change it to make it more fair, realistic, or accurate.

def_cn: 修改（音乐作品）；修订（法律）；审定，校订（文章、书籍）
def_en: When you revise an article, a book, a law, or a piece of music, you change it in order to improve it, make it more modern, or make it more suitable for a particular purpose.
When you revise for an examination, you read things again and make notes in order to be prepared for the examination.
